interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: QIC 4D Silk Fiber Lash Mascara, Fiber Mascara, Waterproof Mascara, Natural Thick Thickening and Lengthening Mascara Lasting All Day
Review Date: 2019/12/14
Store: Joruby
Average Rating: 3.0
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Joruby', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Water Resistance Level': 'Waterproof', 'Package Dimensions': '5.3 x 0.8 x 0.8 inches; 0.81 Ounces'}
Review Text: Disappointed in this product because it did not work for me. I took a couple pictures showing and comparing my eyelashes before and after applying. The mascara was a little pastey but step 1 applied ok and looked fine, but step 2 completely ruined my eyelashes. It looked horrible; The left side got clumped together and the right side looked like my eyelashes were growing baby eyelashes. Very unnatural looking. This claims to be flake free but after it dried i noticed a few little black specks on my cheeks. I had to use one of my old dried up mascara brushes to separate my lashes to fix them. It's also very hard to wash off.
Review Title: After step 2 my eyelashes looked horrible
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Godefroy Tint Kit for Spot Coloring, Dark Brown Godefroy ['Godefroy Professional Hair Color Tint Kit is ideal for coloring small areas of the scalp and facial hair. Pre-measured in separate capsule units, it gives you the versatility to use the exact amount of color with no waste. Great for use on beards, mustaches, sideburns, & temple, anywhere you need a little color. Also can be used for root touch ups in between hair color treatments. No odor & Blends well with existing color'] {'Color': 'Dark Brown', 'Brand': 'Godefroy', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '5.2 x 2.5 x 2.1 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': '203', 'UPC': '852661595933 604106323737 186297000067 726714358472 801276566487', 'Manufacturer': 'Godefroy'} i searched "dark brown eyebrow tint" and this came up and i was about to make the purchase until i fully read the description "This product must not be used for dyeing the eyelashes and eyebrows. To do so may cause blindness" so i dont know why people are condoning the use of this product on their eyebrows/ eye area. i guess they dont care there is a chance of losing eye sight. also amazon needs to remove this from results for eyebrow tint... glad i saw before i bought! Not for use near eyes! may cause blindness! Segbeauty empty bottle 290 TruuMe {'Brand': 'Segbeauty', 'Color': 'Clear', 'Material Type Free': 'Dairy Free', 'Item Weight': '3.4 Ounces', 'Bottle Nipple Type': 'Vented', 'Package Dimensions': '7.99 x 3.19 x 2.24 inches; 3.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'AM-160083-03', 'UPC': '701822757553 701822760621'} This mister is awesome! I got it to use on my house plants and it works great. It holds a little of 5oz, the mist very fine, handle is easy to pull, and it's a continuous spray for few seconds per handle pump! Might consider using on my hair in the future too!

Please let me know if you have any questions about my review, or if you have found it of any help to you. Works great as a plant mister QIC 4D Silk Fiber Lash Mascara, Fiber Mascara, Waterproof Mascara, Natural Thick Thickening and Lengthening Mascara Lasting All Day Joruby {'Brand': 'Joruby', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Water Resistance Level': 'Waterproof', 'Package Dimensions': '5.3 x 0.8 x 0.8 inches; 0.81 Ounces'} Disappointed in this product because it did not work for me. I took a couple pictures showing and comparing my eyelashes before and after applying. The mascara was a little pastey but step 1 applied ok and looked fine, but step 2 completely ruined my eyelashes. It looked horrible; The left side got clumped together and the right side looked like my eyelashes were growing baby eyelashes. Very unnatural looking. This claims to be flake free but after it dried i noticed a few little black specks on my cheeks. I had to use one of my old dried up mascara brushes to separate my lashes to fix them. It's also very hard to wash off. After step 2 my eyelashes looked horrible
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Interest:** The user continues to favor hair coloring products, specifically for touch-ups and small areas, while also exploring multifunctional misting solutions that could be applied to hair. Their interest has expanded to include beauty products that promise high performance and safety.
- **Color Preference:** They remain focused on dark brown shades for hair coloring.
- **Awareness and Caution:** A strong emphasis on safety persists, particularly regarding products suitable for sensitive areas like the eyes. The user prioritizes detailed product descriptions to ensure safety and minimize health risks.
- **Skepticism Towards Popular Use:** The user maintains skepticism towards products not explicitly designed for certain applications, emphasizing caution over convenience.
- **Buying Behavior:** They engage in thorough research before making purchases, reflecting a cautious and informed approach.
- **Rating Trends:** Their rigorous expectations for functionality and safety are evident in their average ratings, with a demand for clear communication in product descriptions.
- **Recent Interactions:** The latest experience with a mascara product has deepened their focus on performance and safety. The user expressed disappointment due to poor application results and difficulty in removal, leading to a low rating. This reinforces their ongoing commitment to prioritizing quality and safety in beauty choices while remaining open to innovative solutions that meet their specific needs.
